original: Sammāsambuddho, paccekasambuddho, ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, dhammānusārī, saddhānusārī.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ paccekasambuddhaḥ ubhatobhāga vimutto paññā vimutto kāya sakkhī diṭṭhi ppatto saddhā vimutto dhamma anusārī saddhā anusārī
translated: One fully enlightened, one severally enlightened, one both-ways liberated, one liberated by understanding, one a body-witness, one attained-to-view, one liberated in mind, one following confidence, one a faith- devotee.
